title: Thanks RIOT!
body:
Let's just take a minute and appreciate the wonderful game RIOT has brought to us.
It's amazingly well made, many game modes, many lovable characters, has very intriguing lore, has a wide variety of skins and champions,
and you don't even have to pay for anything! Sure you could buy a few skins and boosts like i did, but over all it's a fair system.
Sure some champions need to be a bit balanced, but nothings perfect the people who make the game are only human. 
Anyways thank you RIOT for such an amazing game!

o 3 o

Also don't like this post, it wasn't made for likes. It was made for Appreciation!

The meme is the game, the game is the meme.

I get what you're asking for, in regards to "matchmaking", but you are using all the wrong words. MMR and matchmaking are the good parts. The Leagues (ranking) system is what you really want to change. Because that system separates MMR and rank, such that rank is a terrible estimation of skill level, and it's very opaque. Rank is determined only through consistent performance (i.e. grinding for LP, promo series, and demotion protection), with an extra safe-guard to protect against Tier demotion. If you don't care about that extra consistency in your rank, and would rather have a simpler, more exact ranking system, then what you really want to ask for is to have the "Leagues" system removed/reworked, not MMR.

Yeah, the MMR logic is pretty dumb the way I see it. Maybe Riot has a reason for it that they could explain to me in pictures, but if you're in say Silver with a high MMR of Gold, and you're hovering at a 50% winrate because your MMR is right where it needs to be......   why not just be in Gold?

It's nonsensical.
